thread.title: The Internet Reacts To Weird Sexy Mr. Clean Super Bowl Commercial
thread.title_full: The Internet Reacts To Weird Sexy Mr. Clean Super Bowl Commercial

author: Jorge Alonso
title: The Internet Reacts To Weird Sexy Mr. Clean Super Bowl Commercial
text:
For whatever reason Mr. Clean got a makeover and by makeover I mean he’s now Mr. steal yo girl while you’re away at work. 

Twitter reacted hilariously to the Sexy Mr. Clean Super Bowl commercial 
They tried to make Mr. Clean sexy. I feel dirty, not the good kind.
— J.L. Luton (@J_L_Luton) February 6, 2017 
SOMEONE AT MR. CLEAN HEADQUARTERS: we'll make this go viral if we give our mascot a sexy ass
— Dana Schwartz (@DanaSchwartzzz) February 6, 2017 


Mr. Clean got swag! Lesson learned guys, a cleaning man – is a sexy man! Best Super Bowl Commercial
— LyonsEmpire (@lyonsmusicmere) February 6, 2017 
Ewwww. Sexy Mr. Clean is Just Plain Creepy. Ugh. I need to bleach my eyeballs. #SuperBowlCommercials 
— Renee Trudeau (@rbtrudeau) February 6, 2017 


who can i sue for damages after being subjected to sexy mr. clean
— lauren (@laurbudd) February 6, 2017 
Rain drop. Drop top. Mr. Clean sexy with a wet mop pic.twitter.com/3tchlaSC9U 
— TDog (@dudeitstdog) February 6, 2017 


Mr. Clean commercial. pic.twitter.com/IBgl6QStiJ 
— Adam Vingan (@AdamVingan) February 6, 2017
